feed.title: Peppermint Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • live site by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/204
  • site by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/205
  • Update README.md by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/206
  • ui update by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/208
  • Replace hardcoded mail 'from' property by @Kirari04 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/231
  • add Italian translation by @Nervus86 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/229
  • feat(mail): set mail 'from' property to reply mail adress by @rubenhoenle in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/221
  • Add placeholder to ticket editor by @zhedar in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/214
  • Fix duplicated youtube channel by @mark-pitblado in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/211
  • Fixed Unable to delete webhooks by @Moonlight567 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/222
  • various bug fixes
  • ğŸš€ release by @potts99 in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/232

New Contributors

  • @Kirari04 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/231
  • @Nervus86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/229
  • @rubenhoenle made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/221
  • @mark-pitblado made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/211
  • @Moonlight567 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/pull/222

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Peppermint-Lab/peppermint/compare/0.4...0.4.2

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.3
entry.content:
• patch account creation exploit
  • bug fix on deleting a user
  • first implementation of global ticket search
  • first implementation of app based notifications

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.5
entry.content:
• Fix port 465 bug for smtp outbounds
  • Options to Delete and verify smtp outbound email settings
  • Move Ticket based html content ingested via imap into a iframe
  • small ui tweaks
  • improvement to global search

entry.title: New release for Peppermint: 0.4.6
entry.content:
• support for client user registration
  • bug fix for deleting clients
  • UI tweaks & fixes
